mapper.select: select c.c_idx, c.subject, c.m_idx, c.cate_no, c.content, m.userid, m.profile_img, c.view_cnt, c.show, c.filename, c.filesize, c.write_date, c.update_date, (select count(*) from contents_comment where c_idx= c.c_idx)cmt_count, (select cate_name from category where cate_no=c.cate_no)cate_name from contents c join member m on c.m_idx = m.m_idx order by ${order} desc
select * from member where userid=#{userid} and passwd=#{passwd}
select passwd from member where userid=#{userid}
select userid from member where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
select passwd from member where userid=#{userid} and email=#{email}
mapper.update: update member set passwd=#{passwd} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into member(m_idx, userid, passwd, name, email, phone, profile_img, consent, privacy, authority) values( (select nvl(max(m_idx)+1,1) from member), #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{profile_img}, #{consent}, #{privacy}, #{authority})
